name: Epstein, Appellant, v. Erie Indemnity Company

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
parties: Epstein, Appellant, v. Erie Indemnity Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
On the argument at Bar, judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Wm. Pollack, of Pollack & Pollack, with him Charles A. Mertens, Jr., for appellant.
M. E. Graham and Gunnison, Fish, Gifford & Chapin, for appellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Epstein, Appellant, v. Erie Indemnity Company.
Argued October 2, 1940.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
Wm. Pollack, of Pollack & Pollack, with him Charles A. Mertens, Jr., for appellant.
M. E. Graham and Gunnison, Fish, Gifford & Chapin, for appellee, were not heard.
October 28, 1940:
